text: @BBCPolitics @BBCScotlandNews Resign or sack him. My son lives 10 mins away and I couldn't be with him. Why is this guy allowed to travel hundreds of miles, with covid19,   with his child, and spend days with his parents, putting their life at risk also. Resign Cummings if not Boris should sack him
